description:
Putting in 9-5 at the ski hill? These heated gloves last up to 8 hours, with additional Primaloft® insulation for maximum warmth. 3 warmth levels provide heat to the back of your hands, fingers and thumbs, and the waterproof membrane keeps hands dry and comfortable throughout the day.

  • Premium leather palms are tough but supple for ease of movement
  • Waterguard® waterproof, breathable membrane keeps moisture at bay
  • Primaloft® Gold P.U.R.E.™ recycled insulation provides warmth even when the heating is off
  • Wrist strap and collar cinch to keep heat in and snow out
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion batteries included
  • Battery life is up to 8 hours on low, 5 on medium and 2.5 on high
  • Battery pocket has a seam-sealed zipper
  • Wrist leashes hold gloves secure when not being worn
  • Charging plug included
name: Kombi Warm It Up Gloves - Unisex
